Dijkstra.description: Finds the shortest paths from a source to all vertices in the given graph
Dijkstra.bigO: Depending on the used data structure: [O((V + E) log V); O(V²)]

BFS.description: Finds the shortest paths from a source to all vertices in the given graph

DFS.description: Finds the shortest paths from a source to all vertices in the given graph

AStar.description: Finds the shortest paths from a source to all vertices in the given graph
applications: Urban Planning and Geographic Information Systems (GIS)

BubbleSort.description: A simple sorting algorithm that repeatedly steps through the list, compares adjacent elements and swaps them if they are in the wrong order.
